00007  * This class manages the titlescreen of the game which
00008  * is very simple and maybe the class is a bit
00009  * overloaded for such task. Nevertheless we do it
00010  * that way because if more games are added,
00011  * it may get more complicated as the title may
00012  * differ from other passive modes.
00013  */
00014
